categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures voice actors

nodes.text: Daniel Charles "Danny" Jacobs, Jr. provided the voice of Raam in LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. His other projects have included most of the Madagascar franchise (in which he is best known as the voice of King Julien), Phineas and Ferb, and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.
Jacobs and his co-star John DiMaggio, who voiced Baash, also appeared as guests on The Star Wars Show on September 20, 2017.
